name: Crimstopia
startIntroPart1: Zappelyne Crims of Crimstopia, a powerhouse of a civilization that will truly conquer the world with an iron fist that will shoot down any attempts at destruction of this nation, lead the way, our great Matriarch.
declaringWar: You have been too much of a burden to us, and I have calculated that getting rid of you will be more efficient, get ready for war.
attacked: Foolish, as I told you, messing with us will only lead to death, prepare for destruction.
defeated: You have truly shown your power to us, We have lost, but history repeats itself and you will fall as the gates of hell swallow you whole.
introduction: Greetings stranger, don?t mess with us and we won?t mess with you, let's hope I won?t need to repeat this sentence.
